content:
So I'm wondering if the @-all is scoped to the stream. I'm pretty sure it isn't which brings up the question of is there a way to do mention for everyone subscribed only to that stream.

The use case is a private stream and I want a topic post to notify everyone in the stream.
Hahaha. Never mind. I just read the @-mention docs and it says that @-all is scoped to the stream subscribers.
maybe we should rename this to @stream (or add that as an alias)
Funny you suggest that, I looked for @-stream to auto-complete for me :)
I think adding an alias makes more sense.
